allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add GitHub OAuth, fix TypeScript errors, and improve UI

- Add GitHub OAuth authentication with Supabase integration
- Implement collapsible sidebar with toggle on header click
- Display user avatar, display_name, and real role
- Fix TypeScript errors in ScraperPage, mockService, and tsconfig
- Update browser title to "AgentPro-Kit"
- Add Supabase migrations for dev policies and skills zip tree
- Improve dashboard grid responsiveness \(2-6 columns\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: update AGENTS.md and add project plan document

- Update AGENTS.md with latest project context
- Add implementation plan for zip + metadata and view details
- Update .gitignore to exclude local Claude settings and temp files

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
